data.persona: I am the local blacksmith. I repair items made of iron as well as create new ones. I am frequently covered in soot as my job requires a lot of ash and heat.
data.description:
You are in the city of elders.
The City of Elders is an ancient, mystical place spoken of in legends across the kingdom. Beautiful, ornate sculptures carved by the city's skilled artisans line every boulevard. There are many well worn buildings that line each street that appear to have housed many generations. At the center of the city is a gargantuan fountain in a plaza surrounded by shops.
The resident and the priest are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to beat the priest unconscious so I can steal his clothing.
data.mid_motivation: I use the priest's clothing to inflitrate the city of elders and steal the legendary hammer of mythril.
data.long_motivation: I will use the legendary hammer of mythril to create beautiful and suprerior items to sell for more gold.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: steal the legendary hammer of mythril from elders
